title: Updating client bug?
body:
I'm currently updating the game client on NA, and there is an increasing download as opposed to it decreasing. I start off with 2% at 1.8gb and instead of going down, the size is increasing along with the time estimate. Is the installation corrupt or something? OCE downloaded and patched fine. 

Edit: Now sitting at 2.3gb at 3%, and the number is increasing instead of decreasing.

replies.body: I'm thinking that something is blocking the client from downloading! Could be a firewall, or a background program stopping the download so let's have you run through the [Permissions Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104).
